author: Staff
title: Heart Rate Smart Fitness Band Activity Tracker Bracelet Wristband HR Pedometer Wireless Bluetooth 4.0 Steps Distance Sleep Calorie Swipe Touch Screen Call Message Reminder, iOS Android App Black
text:
Heart Rate Smart Fitness Band Activity Tracker Bracelet Wristband HR Pedometer Wireless Bluetooth 4.0 Steps Distance Sleep Calorie Swipe Touch Screen Call Message Reminder, iOS Android App Black WANT to GET MOTIVATED and KEEP HEALTHY EVERY DAY? With ALL-DAY ACTIVITIES TRACKING LIKE HEART RATE, STEPS, WALKING DISTANCE, CALORIES BURNED, GOAL SETTING and SLEEP QUALITY ANALYZER with EASY to USE APP, THIS IS THE RIGHT ONE TO GET. With the intelligence chip and smart “Veryfit for Heart Rate” APP, take charge of your body today with our stylish industry leading Smart Wristband! USB CHARGING, SWIPE TOUCH SENSOR SCREEN and EASY-TO-READ OLED SCREEN KEEPS YOUR GOALS IN FOCUS with STATS, TIME, DATE and NEVER MISS CALL OR TEXT THROUGH VIBRATE NOTIFICATIONS.For the cost of a meal, enjoy your life when motivated. Isn’t that worth it, alone? This will become your perfect companion, it will be with you everywhere you go and looks good on you no matter what you’re wearing! IPX6 WATER RESISTANT FOR SHOWER, SWEATING, HAND-WASH, SWIMMING, COMFORTABLE SILICONE RUBBER BAND WITH SUPER LIGHT WEIGHT SLIM DESIGN, WHAT A GREAT VALUE! Silent vibrate alarm will wake you only while not disturbing your beloved one. Sync wirelessly and automatically to your Smart Phone every time with the app. Search and download “Veryfit for Heart Rate” in APP Store / Google Play Store to unlock all these amazing features. *** iOS 7.1 or Android 4.4 and above required. ** ANALYZE YOUR SLEEP QUALITY BY HOW LONG YOU SLEEP AND HOW WELL YOU SLEEP (Light/Deep Sleep Duration, Awake Times). SET SEDENTARY REMINDER TO DO EXCISE DURING LONG HOUR OFFICE STING TO KEEP HEALTHY. With the anti Lost feature and you will never lose your smart wristband. You’ll get Serious versatility that can even transform your phone into a Remote Shooting Camera to control the shots by simply waving your hand! For the cost of a steak meal, what are you waiting for? WHAT IS IN THE PACKAGE: • Aulker Heart Rate Fitness Activity Tracker Wrist Band x 1 • User Manual x 1 
Highlight Features: • Comfortable Slim Design. Look Great No Matter What You Wear • Swipe Touch Sensor Screen • Wrist Sense: Raise Your Wrist to Show Screen • Track: Steps, Walking Distance, Heart Rate, Calorie Burn, Sleep Hour • Analyze: Goal Progress, Sleep Quality. 7 Days Data Storage Can Link to Apple Health • Heart Rate Monitor with Smart Intelligence Chip • Call, Text Message, Alarm, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Social Apps, Sedentary Vibrate Reminder • IPX6 Water Resistant Level: Sweating, Handwash, Swimming, No Problem! • Long Last Battery: 5-7 Days Use, 1.5H Charge • Remote Camera: Shake to Take Photos • Smart App for Apple and Android: “Veryfit for Heart Rate”. iOS 7.1 / Android 4.4 and above required • Note: There is no charger for this item. With the USB port, there is no need a charger, can directly connect to the computer or socket interface. Specification: • APP: “Veryfit for Heart Rate”. (Apple iOS 7.1 / Android 4.4 and above required) • Bluetooth: 4.0 Up to 20FT / 6.6 Meters • Water Resistant Level: IPX6 – Protected against low pressure water stream from any angle • Control: Swipe and Touch Sensor Screen • Battery Capacity: 60mAh, Last 5-7 Days per Charge • Charge Time: 1.5-2 hour, Pull the Device Out to Charge • Built-In Microphone: NO • Band Clasp Type: Clip Material: • Band Material: Silicone Rubber • Product Material: PC – Poly Carbonate Dimensions: • Min and Max Perimeter to Fit Wrist: 5.75 – 8.26 inch / 146 – 210 cm (Buckle to Hole) • Total Length: 10.04 inch / 25.5 cm • Band Width: 0.75 inch / 1.9 cm • Thickness: 0.35 inch / 0.9 cm • Product Weight: 0.74 Oz / 21 g What Is In The Package: • Aulker Heart Rate Fitness Activity Tracker Wrist Band x 1 • User Manual x 1 
List Price: $ 59.99
